title: Release v7.0.11 Â· storybookjs/storybook Â· GitHub
content:
Bug Fixes
Toolbars: Fix title behavior in UI
#22496
CLI: Fix storybook upgrade precheckfailure object
#22517
CLI: Throw errors instead of rejecting promises
#22515
CLI: Remove unsupported frameworks/renderers and improve builder detection
#22492
Web-components: Fix source decorator to handle document fragments
#22513
Core: Fix windows path error in StoryStore v6
#22512
CLI: Do not show a migration summary on sb init
#22109
UI: Show current search shortcut in search box sidebar
#21619
Outline: Fix additional outline border in docs mode
#21773
Measure: Deactivate when switching to Docs mode
#21602
CSF: Expose story id in composeStories
#22471
CLI: Prompt to force initialization when storybook folder is detected
#22392
UI: Fix css inconsistency in Button and Icon components
#22497

title: Release v8.6.0 Â· storybookjs/storybook Â· GitHub
content:
8.6.0
The 8.6 release focuses on
Storybook Test
, which brings realtime component, accessibility, and visual UI tests to your favorite component workshop.
Hereâ€™s whatâ€™s new:
ðŸŽ
Storybook Test installer
for out-of-the-box tests in new projects
ðŸ¦¾
Accessibility â€œtodoâ€ workflow
to systematically fix a11y violations
ðŸ—œï¸
80% smaller create-storybook
package for much faster installs
ðŸ§ª
Dozens of Test fixes
based on user feedback
ðŸ“•
Docs fixes
for table of contents, code snippets, and more
ðŸš¨
Key security fixes
for Vite and ESbuild
ðŸ’¯ Hundreds more improvements
List of all updates

title: Release v8.2.0 Â· storybookjs/storybook Â· GitHub
content:
8.2.0
Hold onto your hats! Storybook 8.2 has dropped, packed with a treasure trove of new features and bug fixes:
ðŸªÂ New test hook
beforeAll
ðŸ•¹ï¸Â Enhanced
play
function
ðŸ“¦Â Portable stories that let you use your stories in other testing tools
ðŸŽÂ Consolidated dependency to bring you better performance in a smaller package
âœ¨Â Brand new onboarding experience to get you up to speed quicker
ðŸ’¯Â Hundreds more improvements
List of all updates
Addon Controls: Fix saving on Windows -
#28485

@ghengeveld

@yannbf
